attrNatureType3: 自然属性卡牌加成(0表示全部)
overture: 对话气泡是否需要翻转

name: Ash
desc: Trainer from Pallet Town who aims to be a Pokémon Master
desc_tw: 來自真新鎮的訓練家，目標是神奇寶貝大師
desc_en: Trainer from Pallet Town who aims to be a Pokémon Master
desc_kr: "태초마을에서 온 트레이너, 목표는 포켓몬 마스터가 되는 것이다."
chattext1: I will definitely become a Pokémon master!
chattext1_tw: 我一定會成為神奇寶貝大師的！
chattext1_en: I will definitely become a Pokémon Master!
chattext1_kr: 나는 반드시 포켓몬 마스터가 될 거야!
chattext2: When do I want to win a championship?
chattext2_tw: 什麼時候我也想拿個冠軍啊~
chattext2_en: When can I get a championship too...
chattext2_kr: 나는 언제 챔피언이 될 수 있을까
chattext3: go! Pikachu! It's up to you!
chattext3_tw: 去吧！皮卡丘！就決定是你了！
chattext3_en: Go, Pikachu! I choose you!

name: Misty
desc: Gym leader of Cerulean Gym, specialized in Water-type Pokémons
desc_tw: 華藍道館館主，水屬性精靈的達人
desc_en: Gym leader of Cerulean Gym, specialized in Water-type Pokémons
desc_kr: "블루시티 체육관 관장, 물 타입 포켓몬의 전문가."
chattext1: It's a water-type Pokémon attacking, attacking, attacking... Keep attacking!
chattext1_tw: 是用水屬性寶可夢進攻進攻進攻……一個勁兒地進攻！
chattext1_en: It uses water-type Pokémon to attack, attack and attack... and never stops!
chattext1_kr: 물 타입 포켓몬으로 공격하고 공격하고 또 공격하고...... 끝까지 공격을 하겠어!
chattext2: When I become strong enough, I must travel again!
chattext2_tw: 等我什麼時候變得足夠強了，我一定要再次出門旅行喲！
chattext2_en: When I become strong enough, I will definitely embark in another journey again!
chattext2_kr: "충분히 강해졌을 때, 꼭 여행을 떠날 거야!"
chattext3: The beach here is so romantic, I like it here~
chattext3_tw: 這裡的海灘好浪漫，我喜歡這裡~
chattext3_en: "I love this beach, it's so romantic here!"

name: Rapp
desc: Member of Team Skull that often appears with Tupp and Zipp
desc_tw: 骷髏隊的手下,常跟夥伴達帕和吉普出現
desc_en: Member of Team Skull that often appears with Tupp and Zipp
desc_kr: "스컬단의 수하, 동료인 터퍼, 지프와 함께 나타난다."
chattext1: Since you are sincere... oh, sorry, I read the wrong line
chattext1_tw: 既然你誠心…哦，不好意思，看錯臺詞了
chattext1_en: Did someone ask ...... oops, I think that's not my line
chattext1_kr: "성의를 보아... 앗, 미안, 대사를 잘못 봤네"
chattext2: Island tour? What is that, is it delicious?
chattext2_tw: 諸島巡禮？那是什麼，好吃麼？
chattext2_en: Island hopping? What's that? Something delicious?
chattext2_kr: 군도 순례? 그게 뭐야? 먹는 거야?
chattext3: Strength, as long as we have the boss!
chattext3_tw: 實力，我們有老大就行了！
chattext3_en: Strength? We have our boss!

name: Plumeria
desc: Team Skull Leader
desc_tw: 骷髏隊幹部
desc_en: Team Skull Leader
desc_kr: 스컬단의 간부.
unlockDesc_vn: Đặc thù hoạt động tung ra
chattext1: Cut, it's so troublesome, I'll beat you up!
chattext1_tw: 切，真麻煩，我揍你哦！
chattext1_en: Tsk, that's so troublesome, I'll beat you up!
chattext1_kr: "쳇, 귀찮게, 그러다 맞는다!"
chattext2: Ha, this little thing can't be done well, you get out of the way, I'll come!
chattext2_tw: 哈，這點小事都辦不好，你閃開，我來！
chattext2_en: Ha, you can't even get this simple thing done! Step aside, let me do it!
chattext2_kr: "하아, 고작 이정도 일도 처리 못 하다니. 비켜봐, 내가 할게!"
chattext3: I'm in charge of Team Skeleton... aka their big sister. As you know, these guys are stupid as hell.
chattext3_tw: 我負責統領骷髏隊……也就是他們的大姐頭。如你所知，這班傢伙都笨得要命。
chattext3_en: I'm in charge of Team Skull... and also their lady boss. As you know, these guys are all very dumb.
chattext3_kr: "나는 스컬단을 총괄하고 있지....... 그게 바로 저들의 보스야. 너가 알듯이, 이 녀석들은 멍청하기 짝이 없지."

name: Morgan
desc: One of the leaders of the Battle Maison, the eldest of the Battle Chatelaine.
desc_tw: 對戰宅第的對戰女城主之一，四姊妹中的長女
desc_en: One of the leaders of the Battle Maison, the eldest of the Battle Chatelaine.
desc_kr: "배틀하우스의 배틀샤틀레느 중 한 명, 4자매의 장녀."
unlockDesc: Obtained by exchanging in the Arena
unlockDesc_en: Obtained by exchanging in the Arena
chattext1: Want to have a nice battle?
chattext1_tw: 要來一場愉快的對戰麼？
chattext1_en: Wanna have a satisfying battle with me?
chattext1_kr: 유쾌한 전투를 하지 않겠어?
chattext2: I love playing roulette against a variety of challengers
chattext2_tw: 我喜歡與各種各樣的挑戰者進行輪盤對戰
chattext2_en: I like to play roulette against various challengers
chattext2_kr: 나는 다양한 도전자와 서바이벌 대전을 하는 것을 즐기지
chattext3: Lan Zhouni's temper is a bit aggressive, she's a little worried
chattext3_tw: 蘭晝妮的性子有點好勝，有點擔心啊
chattext3_en: I'm worried about Dana, she can be a little overly competitive

name: Meray
desc: Young girl that takes care of the Djinn Pokémon Hoopa, and lives with it at the Arche Valley.
desc_tw: 照顧幻之神奇寶貝胡帕的少女。在創世之谷與胡帕一同成長。
desc_en: Young girl that takes care of the Djinn Pokémon Hoopa, and lives with it at the Arche Valley.
desc_kr: "환상의 포켓몬 후파를 돌보는 소녀, 아르케의 계곡에서 후파와 함께 자랐다."
unlockDesc_vn: Đặc thù hoạt động tung ra
chattext1: I'm Mayali, I'm taking care of Hoopa
chattext2: Hoopa, come on! Punishment or something, let him pass!
chattext3: Great, Hoopa, you can finally go through the ring yourself!

name: Alexa
desc: Reporter from Lumiose City, elder sister of Viola.
desc_tw: 來自密阿雷市的記者，紫羅蘭的姐姐
desc_en: Reporter from Lumiose City, elder sister of Viola.
desc_kr: "미르시티의 기자, 비올라의 언니."
chattext1: As a reporter, of course you are collecting materials 24 hours a day!
chattext1_tw: 作為記者，當然是全天24小時都在取材！
chattext1_en: As a reporter, I collect materials 24 hours a day!
chattext1_kr: "기자로서, 당연히 하루 24시간 내내 기삿거리를 찾고 있지!"
chattext2: It's great that you are also interested in the traditional harvest festival of Fruit Island
chattext2_tw: 你也對果實島傳統收穫祭典感興趣嘛，那真是太好了
chattext2_en: Are you also interested in the traditional harvest festival of Minori Island? That’s great
chattext2_kr: "너도 과일 섬의 전통 수확제에 흥미 있어 보이네, 정말 다행이야"
chattext3: Not all information can be reported, everyone has a little secret
chattext3_tw: 並不是所有的資訊都是可以報導的哦，人都有點小秘密
chattext3_en: Not all information can be disclosed, everyone has a little secret
chattext3_kr: "모든 정보를 보도할 수 있는 건 아니야, 누구나 작은 비밀 한두 개는 있는 법이니까"

name: Viola
desc: Gym Leader of Santalune Gym in Kalos region, specialized in Bug-type Pokémons
desc_tw: 卡洛斯地區白檀市白檀道館道館館主，專長為蟲屬性寶可夢
desc_en: Gym Leader of Santalune Gym in Kalos region, specialized in Bug-type Pokémons
desc_kr: "칼로스지방 백단시티 백단체육관의 관장, 벌레 타입 포켓몬 전문이다."
unlockDesc: Get by exchanging in Global Indigo Plateau Conference
unlockDesc_tw: 跨服石英大會內兌換獲得
unlockDesc_en: Get by exchanging in Global Indigo Plateau Conference
unlockDesc_kr: 글로벌 석영 대회 내 교환으로 획득
chattext1: I like to like to photograph everything worth photographing
chattext1_tw: 我喜歡喜歡拍下一切值得拍攝的東西
chattext1_en: I enjoy taking pictures of all things that are worth taking.
chattext1_kr: 나는 모든 기억할만한 것을 사진으로 남기는 걸 좋아해
chattext2: Let me take a picture of your most shining moment!
chattext2_tw: 就讓我來拍下你最閃亮的一刻吧！
chattext2_en: Let me capture your best moments!
chattext2_kr: 너가 가장 빛나는 순간을 찍어 줄게!
chattext3: The secret to winning? That is full of confidence!
chattext3_tw: 獲勝的秘訣？那就是充滿自信！
chattext3_en: What's the secret to victory? Confidence!

name: Marlon
desc: Seigaiha Gym Leader, specializes in water-type Pokémons.
desc_tw: 青海波道館中的道館館主，專長為水屬性寶可夢。
desc_en: Seigaiha Gym Leader, specializes in water-type Pokémons.
desc_kr: "기하체육관의 관장, 물 타입 포켓몬 전문이다."
unlockDesc_vn: Đặc thù hoạt động tung ra
chattext1: the sea! Oh, this beach is awesome!
chattext1_tw: 大海！哦，這片海灘真棒啊！
chattext1_en: It's the sea! Wow, this sea is awesome!
chattext1_kr: "바다다! 아, 정말 멋진 바다야!"
chattext2: My strength is as vast as the sea. You will be shocked! Facts speak louder than words! let us start!
chattext2_tw: 我的強大就像是大海一樣廣闊。你一定會嚇一跳的！事實勝於雄辯！我們開始吧！
chattext2_en: My strength is as vast as the sea. You will definitely be surprised! Actions speak louder than words! Let's begin!
chattext2_kr: 내 강함은 바다처럼 넓지. 너는 분명 놀라게 될 거야! 말보다는 행동! 시작하자!
chattext3: You are strong, but you are still too small in front of the sea!
chattext3_tw: 你很強，但在大海面前還是太過渺小！
chattext3_en: Although you're strong, you're merely a small fry in this vast ocean!
chattext3_kr: "너는 강하지만, 바다 앞에서는 작아 보일 뿐이야!"

name: Roxanne
desc: Gym Leader of Kanazumi Gym, a scholar who specializes in Rock-type Pokémons.
desc_tw: 卡那茲道館的道館館主，學者，專長為岩石屬性寶可夢
desc_en: Gym Leader of Kanazumi Gym, a scholar who specializes in Rock-type Pokémons.
desc_kr: "금탄체육관의 관장, 바위 타입 포켓몬 전문이다."
chattext1: You ask me which attribute of the elf is the best, so do you still have to ask? Of course it is the rock system!
chattext1_tw: 你問我什麼屬性的精靈最好，那還用問麼？當然是岩石系啊！
chattext1_en: You ask me which is the best Pokémon type? Isn't that obvious? The rock-type, of course!
chattext1_kr: "나한테 무슨 타입 포켓몬 가장 좋다 물어보다니, 당연한 거 아니야? 당연히 바위 타입이지!"
chattext2: It seems that someone called me "a top student who is obsessed with rock!" Actually, I am not exaggerating that much
chattext2_tw: 好像有人叫我“醉心于岩石的高材生！”，其實我也沒有那麼誇張啦
chattext2_en: I think some people refer to me as "the outstanding student who is obsessed with rocks" , but that is an exaggeration
chattext2_kr: "누가 나를 “바위와 사랑에 빠진 우등생!”이라고 부르는 것 같던데, 사실 그 정도까지는 아니야"
chattext3: Can you tell me which Pokémon you want to use and how to fight?
chattext3_tw: 你要使用哪種寶可夢，如何對戰，可以告訴我嗎？
chattext3_en: Which Pokémon are you using? How are you gonna fight? Can you tell me?
chattext3_kr: 무슨 포켓몬으로 어떻게 싸울 건지 알려줄 수 있어?

name: Colress
desc: A mysterious man who studies the hidden powers and talents of Pokémons.
desc_tw: 專注於研究寶可夢隱藏的力量和才能，是個神秘的男人。
desc_en: A mysterious man who studies the hidden powers and talents of Pokémons.
desc_kr: 포켓몬의 숨겨진 힘과 재능에 대해 연구하는 신비한 남자.
unlockDesc_vn: Đặc thù hoạt động tung ra
chattext1: satellitehead? i like being called that because i'm a scientist
chattext2: The stones on Route 10 are said to release mystical energies
chattext3: The bond between trainers and elves is very important

name: Flannery
desc: Gym leader of Lavaridge Gym, the official gym of Lavaridge Town, specialized in Fire-type Pokémons
desc_tw: 釜炎鎮的官方道館，釜炎道館的道館館主,專長為火屬性精靈
desc_en: Gym leader of Lavaridge Gym, the official gym of Lavaridge Town, specialized in Fire-type Pokémons
desc_kr: "용암마을 용암체육관의 관장, 불꽃 타입 포켓몬 전문이다."
unlockDesc: Exchange in the guild to get
unlockDesc_en: Exchange in the guild to get
chattext1: Although I am the owner of the new human gymnasium, don't underestimate me
chattext1_tw: 雖然我是新人道館館主，別小看我哦
chattext1_en: I am the new gym leader, but do not underestimate my abilities!
chattext1_kr: "비록 나는 입문자 체육관 관장이지만, 얕보지는 말라고"
chattext2: Forcing to speak in a harsh tone is really not suitable for me
chattext2_tw: 強行用嚴厲口氣說話，還真不太適合我
chattext2_en: I have to force myself to speak in a harsher tone, as it really doesn't suit me.
chattext2_kr: 억지로 강경한 말투로 말하는 건 나한테 어울리지 않아
chattext3: After a tiring day, go to a hot spring
chattext3_tw: 一天勞累之後，去泡個溫泉吧
chattext3_en: Let's go for hot spring after a hard day.
chattext3_kr: "하루 종일 고생했으니, 온천에다 몸을 담고 쉬어"

name: Hugh
desc: One who is passionate about Pokémon battles and becoming stronger, and a good brother who loves his sister.
desc_tw: 熱衷於寶可夢對戰和變強，是個疼愛妹妹的好哥哥。
desc_en: One who is passionate about Pokémon battles and becoming stronger, and a good brother who loves his sister.
desc_kr: "포켓몬 대전과 강해지는 것에 집착하며, 여동생을 매우 아낀다."
chattext1: Apart from becoming stronger, is there anything else I need to care about!
chattext1_tw: 除了變強，還有什麼別的東西需要在意麼！
chattext1_en: Apart from becoming stronger, are there nothing else that I have to look out for?
chattext1_kr: "강해지는 거 말고는, 신경 써야 할 것이 더 있는가!"
chattext2: If you have time to care about those girls, why not go to special training!
chattext2_tw: 有時間在意那些女生的話不如去特訓啊！
chattext2_en: If you have time to pay attention to those girls, you might as well go for an intensive training!
chattext2_kr: 저 여자애들 챙길 시간이 있으면 차라리 특훈을 하라고!
chattext3: do not bother me!
chattext3_tw: 別來煩我！
chattext3_en: Stop bothering me!

name: Roxie
desc: Virbank Gym Leader, specializes in Poison-type Pokémons
desc_tw: 立湧道館的道館館主，專長為毒屬性寶可夢
desc_en: Virbank Gym Leader, specializes in Poison-type Pokémons
desc_kr: "모란만체육관의 관장, 독 타입 포켓몬 전문이다."
unlockDesc: Obtain by exchanging in Indigo Plateau Conference
unlockDesc_en: Obtain by exchanging in Indigo Plateau Conference
chattext1: Poison plays my life, poison plays the stage!
chattext1_tw: 毒奏吾命，毒奏舞臺！
chattext1_en: Poison is my life, poison is my stage!
chattext1_kr: 독은 삶이자 나의 무대이지!
chattext2: let's go! ! I want to blow your rationality away! !
chattext2_tw: 上吧！！我要打爆你的理性！！
chattext2_en: Let's start!! I'mma crush your reasoning!!
chattext2_kr: 가라!! 너의 이성을 터트려 주겠어!!
chattext3: Wait a moment! Still tuning!
chattext3_tw: 等一下！還在調音！
chattext3_en: Wait! I'm still adjusting the sound!

name: Bianca
desc: A girl who always have her way gets troubled at times because she's uncertain of her dreams.
desc_tw: 一個我行我素的女孩，有時會因為看不清自己的夢想而煩惱。
desc_en: A girl who always have her way gets troubled at times because she's uncertain of her dreams.
desc_kr: "자유분방한 성격의 소녀, 자신의 꿈에 대해 확신을 갖지 못해 고민하곤 한다."
unlockDesc_vn: Đặc thù hoạt động tung ra
chattext1: Come on, let's fight!
chattext1_tw: 來吧，對戰吧！
chattext1_en: Well ,let's battle!
chattext1_kr: "좋아, 나랑 대결하자!"
chattext2: Can I win the gymnasium next time, I am uneasy
chattext2_tw: 下次道館賽能不能贏呢，不安
chattext2_en: Can I win, I'm not sure.
chattext2_kr: "다음 체육관 대회에서 이길 수 있을까, 불안하네"
chattext3: Isn't it common sense to wear a hand-knitted sweater for your elf?
chattext3_tw: 要為自己的精靈穿上親手織的毛衣不是常識麼！
chattext3_en: It's my duty.
chattext3_kr: 자신의 포켓몬에게 직접 만든 스웨트를 입혀주는 건 상식이지!

name: Korrina
desc: Gym Leader of the Shalour Gym in Kalos region, specializes in Fighting-typing Pokémons
desc_tw: 卡洛斯地區娑羅市道館的道館館主，專長為格鬥屬性寶可夢
desc_en: Gym Leader of the Shalour Gym in Kalos region, specializes in Fighting-typing Pokémons
desc_kr: "칼로스지방 사라시티 체육관의 관장, 격투 타입 포켓몬 전문이다."
chattext1: Just kidding!
chattext1_tw: 開玩笑的啦！
chattext1_en: Just kidding!
chattext1_kr: 장난이야!
chattext2: Your fetters can exert unprecedented power!
chattext2_tw: 你們的羈絆，可以發揮空前絕後的力量！
chattext2_en: Your bonds are strong enough to unleash formidable power!
chattext2_kr: "너희의 유대는, 유례 없는 힘을 발휘할 수 있어!"
chattext3: Give each other courage, care for each other, as long as you have such kindness, you will definitely be able to show a smiling face!
chattext3_tw: 互相給予勇氣，互相關心對方，只要有這樣的善良，就一定能展現出笑臉！
chattext3_en: Encourage each other and care for each other. I'm sure that as long as you show such kindness, you will be able to bring smiles to faces!
chattext3_kr: "서로 용기를 불어주고, 서로에게 관심을 주는 그런 선량함만 있다면, 반드시 웃게 만들 수 있어!"

name: Dana
desc: One of the leaders of the Battle Maison, the second eldest of the Battle Chatelaine.
desc_tw: 對戰宅第的對戰女城主之一，四姊妹中的次女
desc_en: One of the leaders of the Battle Maison, the second eldest of the Battle Chatelaine.
desc_kr: "배틀하우스의 배틀샤틀레느 중 한 명, 4자매의 차녀."
chattext1: Heart fire is ignited
chattext1_tw: 心火被點燃了呢
chattext1_en: Fire in my heart is burning right now
chattext1_kr: 마음의 불은 피었네.
chattext2: My younger sister is too shy to play doubles together
chattext2_tw: 妹妹太靦腆了，一起打雙打對決都沒什麼話
chattext2_en: Evelyn is too shy, she don't speak much even in Double Battle
chattext2_kr: 동생 너무 수줍어서 복식 대결해도 아무 말 없네.
chattext3: You can't lose against the female castellan of the mansion
chattext3_tw: 對戰宅第女城主是不會輸的
chattext3_en: Battle Chatelaine will never lose

name: Evelyn
desc: One of the leaders of the Battle Maison, the third eldest of the Battle Chatelaine.
desc_tw: 對戰宅第的對戰女城主之一，四姊妹中的三女
desc_en: One of the leaders of the Battle Maison, the third eldest of the Battle Chatelaine.
desc_kr: "배틀하우스의 배틀샤틀레느 중 한 명, 4자매의 삼녀."
chattext1: I heard that someone won the championship with Patch, do you know the details?
chattext1_tw: 聽說有人用小帕奇贏了冠軍賽，你知道詳情麼
chattext1_en: I heard that some won the final with Pachirisu, did you know that?
chattext1_kr: 누가 작은 파치로 챔피언 결정전을 이겼다고 하던데, 알고 있어요?
chattext2: Little Patch is so cute, how could he be called a devil?
chattext2_tw: 小帕奇那麼可愛，怎麼會被叫成惡魔嘛
chattext2_en: How could people call Pachirusu demon since it was so cute
chattext2_kr: 파기가 그렇게 귀여운데 어떻게 악마라고 불릴 수 있어?
chattext3: Let's leave it to the sisters to communicate.
chattext3_tw: 交流的事情還是交給姐姐們吧
chattext3_en: Leave the communication to the sisters

name: Nita
desc: One of the leaders of the Battle Maison, the youngest of the Battle Chatelaine.
desc_tw: 對戰宅第的對戰女城主之一，四姊妹中的么女。
desc_en: One of the leaders of the Battle Maison, the youngest of the Battle Chatelaine.
desc_kr: "배틀하우스의 배틀샤틀레느 중 한 명, 4자매의 막내."
unlockDesc_vn: Đặc thù hoạt động tung ra
chattext1: Then let me have fun next time! Be aware! Ha! !
chattext1_tw: 那麼接下來要讓拉我的盡興喲！做好覺悟吧！哈呀！！
chattext1_kr: 그럼 이제 나는 마음껏 즐길게! 각오해라! 하야!!
chattext2: hey hey
chattext2_tw: 誒 嘿
chattext2_kr: 에 헤
chattext3: I'm not weaker than my sisters
chattext3_tw: 我實力可不比姐姐們弱哦
chattext3_kr: 내 실력이 언니들보다 결코 약하지 않거든.

name: Lenora
desc: Gym leader of Nacrene Gym. Specializes in Normal-type Pokémons.
desc_tw: 七寶道館的道館館主。專長為一般屬性寶可夢。
desc_en: Gym leader of Nacrene Gym. Specializes in Normal-type Pokémons.
desc_kr: "칠보체육관의 관장, 노말 타입의 포켓몬 전문이다."
unlockDesc_tw: 冒險執照等級達到5級後可解鎖
unlockDesc_kr: 모험 허가증 5레벨 달성 시 개방 가능
chattext1: Challenger, I'm about to study from you how much you love your Pokémon during the challenge!
chattext1_tw: 挑戰者，我即將向你那裡研究你在挑戰中到底有多疼愛你的寶可夢！
chattext1_en: Challenger, I'm going to find out how much you love your Pokémons in a battle!
chattext1_kr: "도전자여, 나는 너가 도전에서 얼마나 너의 포켓몬을 아끼는지 시험해 볼 것이다!"
chattext2: The way you fight is fascinating!
chattext2_tw: 你的作戰方式真是迷人！
chattext2_en: You battle style is so charming!
chattext2_kr: 너의 전투 방식은 참 흥미롭다!
chattext3: That's amazing, I have to give you a good compliment!
chattext3_tw: 真是了不起，得好好表揚你才行啊！
chattext3_en: Awesome, you deserve to be complimented!

name: Hilda
desc: The female protagonist of Pokémon Black and White
desc_tw: 是《黑／白》的女性主角
desc_en: The female protagonist of Pokémon Black and White
desc_kr: <블랙/화이트>의 여자 주인공.
chattext1: Have a great time! Next time we will have another game!
chattext1_tw: 玩得好爽啊！下次我們再來一場哦！
chattext1_en: That was fun! Let's do it again next time!
chattext1_kr: 정말 재밌었다! 다음에도 한 판 더 하자!
chattext2: Starting late doesn't mean you will be weak!
chattext2_tw: 開始得晚不代表一定會弱哦！
chattext2_en: Starting late doesn't mean that you will be weak!
chattext2_kr: 늦게 시작했다고 약하다는 건 아니야!
chattext3: Let's go and be a hero together!
chattext3_tw: 一起去成為英雄吧！
chattext3_en: Let's become a hero!

name: Rosa
desc: Young girl living in Aspertia City who begins the adventure with her childhood friend Hugh.
desc_tw: 來自檜扇市的少女，在遊戲的開始中會跟童年好友兼勁敵修一起從此開展旅程。
desc_en: Young girl living in Aspertia City who begins the adventure with her childhood friend Hugh.
desc_kr: "부채시티에서 온 소녀, 소꿉친구이자 라이벌인 휴이와 함께 모험을 시작한다."
unlockDesc: Exchange in the guild war to get
unlockDesc_en: Exchange in the guild war to get
chattext1: Let's become an invincible combination!
chattext1_tw: 咱們來成為無敵的組合吧！
chattext1_en: Let's form an invincible group!
chattext1_kr: 우리 무적의 조합을 만들자!
chattext2: It's a great feeling to fight!
chattext2_tw: 對戰真是個好棒的感覺哦！
chattext2_en: It feels good to have a battle!
chattext2_kr: 대전의 느낌은 최고야!
chattext3: I want to become stronger and hope to fight with other trainers one day!
chattext3_tw: 我要變得更強，希望有一天跟別的訓練家盡力戰鬥！
chattext3_en: I want to get stronger and fight alongside other trainers one day!
chattext3_kr: "나는 더 강해져서, 언젠가는 다른 트레이너와 최선을 다해 싸울 거야!"

name: Millis
desc: One of the rogue duo who tried to catch Diancie and get her diamonds; turned over a new leaf subsequently and opened a chocolate shop.
desc_tw: 雙人組大盜賊之一，企圖抓蒂安希來獲得到她的鑽石；後改邪歸正，開了一家巧克力店。
desc_en: One of the rogue duo who tried to catch Diancie and get her diamonds; turned over a new leaf subsequently and opened a chocolate shop.
desc_kr: "2인조 대도적 중 한 명, 디안시를 잡아 그녀의 보석을 손에 넣으려 했지만, 훗날 개과천선하고 초콜릿 가게를 차렸다."
unlockDesc_vn: Đặc thù hoạt động tung ra
chattext1: Rockets, let's have a head-to-head contest!
chattext1_kr: 로켓단, 정면 승부 한 번 해보자!
chattext2: Bricaron seems to like my shawl emmm
chattext2_kr: 브리가론이 나의 숄을 좋아하는 것 같는데..
chattext3: Unfortunately, it turned out that Tianxi couldn't make diamonds!
chattext3_kr: 아쉽네, 디안시가 다이아몬드를 할 줄 몰랐구나.

name: Phoebe
desc: One of Hoenn's Elite Four, who specializes in Ghost-type Pokémons
desc_tw: 豐緣四天王的一員，也是幽靈屬性達人
desc_en: One of Hoenn's Elite Four, who specializes in Ghost-type Pokémons
desc_kr: "호연 사천왕의 일원, 고스트 타입의 전문가."
unlockDesc_vn: Đặc thù hoạt động tung ra
chattext1: Do you also have a strong bond with your elves?
chattext1_tw: 你和你的精靈之間也會有著很強的牽絆嗎？
chattext1_en: Do you have strong bond between your Pokémon too?
chattext2: In the past, I gained the ability to communicate intimately with ghost spirits when I practiced in Sending Shenshan.
chattext2_tw: 過去我在送神山修行時得到了能與幽靈寶系精靈親密交流的能力。
chattext2_en: I got the power of communicate with Ghost-Type Pokémon when I was practice in Mt. Pyre.
chattext3: Confuse the opponent to fight, interfere and interfere again.
chattext3_tw: 迷惑對手作戰，干擾再干擾。
chattext3_en: Confuse your enemu, distract them to win.

name: Lana
desc: Captain of Akala Island in the Alola region, who is proficient in Water-type Pokémons
desc_tw: 阿羅拉地區中阿卡拉島的隊長，精通水屬性
desc_en: Captain of Akala Island in the Alola region, who is proficient in Water-type Pokémons
desc_kr: "알로라지방 아칼라섬의 캡틴 중 한 명, 물 타입 전문가."
chattext1: As long as it is the elf in the water, I like it very much.
chattext1_tw: 只要是水裡的精靈我都很喜歡哦
chattext1_en: I love all the Pokémons in water
chattext1_kr: 물속의 포켓몬이라면 나는 다 좋아
chattext2: Let's go fishing together
chattext2_tw: 有空一起去釣魚吧
chattext2_en: Let's go fishing
chattext2_kr: 시간 나면 같이 낚시나 하자
chattext3: Kyoka can be caught on the tidal coast (laughs)
chattext3_tw: 潮汐海岸能釣到蓋歐卡哦（笑）
chattext3_en: You might encounter Kyogre at Tidal Coast XD
chattext3_kr: 조석의 해안에서 가이오가를 낚을 수 있어(웃음)

name: Green
desc: The female protagonist of Pokémon FireRed and LeafGreen
desc_tw: 《火紅／葉綠》中的女性主角
desc_en: The female protagonist of Pokémon FireRed and LeafGreen
desc_kr: <파이어레드/리프그린>의 여자 주인공.
chattext1: Forget it! Let me confirm your strength again!
chattext1_tw: 算了算了！就讓我再確認一次你的實力吧！
chattext1_en: Forget it! Let me take a look at your strength again!
chattext1_kr: 됐어 됐어! 너의 실력을 다시 한번 확인하도록 하지!
chattext2: Really! What's going on...
chattext2_tw: 真是的！怎麼回事嘛……
chattext2_en: Sigh! What's going on......
chattext2_kr: 정말이지! 무슨 일이냐고.......
chattext3: I will not give up!
chattext3_tw: 我是不會放棄的！
chattext3_en: I'll never give up!

name: Brock
desc: Gym Leader of Pewter Gym, specializes in Rock-type Pokémons
desc_tw: 尼比道館道館訓練家，擅長岩石系精靈
desc_en: Gym Leader of Pewter Gym, specializes in Rock-type Pokémons
desc_kr: "회색체육관의 관장, 바위 타입 포켓몬의 전문가."
chattext1: My will is as solid as a rock!
chattext1_tw: 我的意志堅如磐石！
chattext1_en: My will is as strong as a rock!
chattext1_kr: 나의 의지는 바위처럼 굳건하지!
chattext2: There seems to be a beautiful big sister over there, let's say hello~
chattext2_tw: 那邊似乎有漂亮的大姐姐， 去打個招呼吧~
chattext2_en: "There seems to be a beautiful lady there, go and say hi to her!"
chattext3: it is good! It's time to fulfill our promise!
chattext3_tw: 好！是時候履行我們的諾言了！
chattext3_en: Alright! It's time to fulfill our promise!
chattext3_kr: 좋았어! 우리의 약속을 이행할 때가 왔어!

name: Wicke
desc: Branch Chief of Aether Paradise . As some very considerate, he is admired by the employees.
desc_tw: 乙太樂園的副分部長。性格非常體貼的緣故，被員工們仰慕著。
desc_en: Branch Chief of Aether Paradise . As some very considerate, he is admired by the employees.
desc_kr: "에테르파라다이스의 부지부장, 성격이 매우 자상해 직원들이 좋아한다."
unlockDesc: Obtained by exchanging in Aether Paradise
unlockDesc_en: Obtained by exchanging in Aether Paradise
chattext1: The battle data is not ideal, it seems that training is still needed
chattext1_tw: 戰鬥資料不太理想的樣子呢，看來還需要訓練
chattext1_kr: "전투 데이터가 마음에 들지는 않아, 훈련이 필요해 보이네"
chattext2: If you want to join the institute in the future, you can come to me
chattext2_tw: 如果你以後想加入研究所，可以來找我哦
chattext2_kr: "연구소에 들어오고 싶다면, 나를 찾아오면 돼"
chattext3: I like research more than fighting
chattext3_tw: 比起對戰，我更喜歡研究呢

name: Tupp
desc: Member of Team Skull, often appears with Zipp and Rapp
desc_tw: 骷髏隊手下,常跟同伴吉普和拉普出現
desc_en: Member of Team Skull, often appears with Zipp and Rapp
desc_kr: "스컬단의 수하, 동료인 지프, 랩과 함께 나타난다."
chattext1: I'll tell you mercifully... oh, sorry, I got my lines wrong too
chattext1_tw: 我就大發慈悲地告訴你...…哦，不好意思，看我也錯臺詞了
chattext1_en: Noble answers are what we're all ...... oops, I think that's not my line
chattext1_kr: "자비를 베풀어 알려주지... 앗, 미안, 나도 대사를 잘못 봤네"
chattext2: I don't want to do troublesome things like island pilgrimage~
chattext2_tw: 我才不想去做諸島巡禮這種麻煩的事情呢~
chattext2_en: I'm not gonna do something so troublesome like island hopping!
chattext3: Even if the strength is insufficient, as long as the momentum is enough, it is enough~
chattext3_tw: 即便實力不足，只要氣勢夠，就足夠了~
chattext3_en: "Even if you are not strong enough, as long as you are confident, that's enough!"

name: Kukui
desc: Scientist of the Kalos region who lives in the Lumiose City. Before the rookie trainer heads out, they have to get the starter Pokémon from him.
desc_tw: 卡洛斯地區的神奇寶貝研究員，住在密阿雷市。新人訓練家岀發時，都要前來和他拿取最初的神奇寶貝。
desc_en: Scientist of the Kalos region who lives in the Lumiose City. Before the rookie trainer heads out, they have to get the starter Pokémon from him.
desc_kr: "칼로스지방의 포켓몬 연구원, 미르시티에 살고 있다. 신참 트레이너가 모험을 나설 때, 그에게 첫 포켓몬을 받을 수 있다."

name: Alain
desc: Former researcher Professor Sycamore, who left the research institute and embarked a trainer's journey with Charmander, in order to explore the secrets of Mega evolution and the path to the strongest Mega evolution.
desc_tw: 原為布拉塔諾博士的研究員，為了探究mega進化的秘密和邁向最強mega進化的訓練家之路，帶小火龍一同離開研究院踏上旅程。
desc_en: Former researcher Professor Sycamore, who left the research institute and embarked a trainer's journey with Charmander, in order to explore the secrets of Mega evolution and the path to the strongest Mega evolution.
desc_kr: "원래 플라타느 박사의 연구원이었지만, 메가진화의 비밀을 알아내기 위해 파이리와 함께 연구소를 떠나 최강 메가진화 트레이너의 길에 나섰다."
unlockDesc: Obtained by exchanging in the Arena
unlockDesc_en: Obtained by exchanging in the Arena

name: Professor Oak
desc: A prestigious Pokémon research expert in Kanto region and one of the creators of Pokédex. His main research area is behavior of Pokémons.
desc_tw: 關東地區非常具有威望的精靈研究達人，並且是圖鑒的創作人之一，主要研究方向為精靈行為。
desc_en: A prestigious Pokémon research expert in Kanto region and one of the creators of Pokédex. His main research area is behavior of Pokémons.
desc_kr: "관동지방에서 매우 권위 있는 포켓몬 연구자, 포켓몬 도감을 만든 인물이기도 하다. 주로 포켓몬의 행동에 대해 연구한다."
unlockDesc_vn: Đặc thù hoạt động tung ra
chattext1: Why so hard?
chattext1_tw: 為何如此努力呢？
chattext1_en: Do we work so hard?
chattext1_kr: 왜 그리 열심히 하는 거야?
chattext2: Feel the trust and love of the elves, don't forget this!
chattext2_tw: 感受精靈的信賴與愛，不要忘記這一點哦！
chattext2_en: Don't forget to enjoy the trust and love from the Pokémons!
chattext2_kr: "포켓몬의 신뢰와 사랑을 느껴봐, 까먹지 말고!"
chattext3: Set off to a world full of dreams and adventures!
chattext3_tw: 向著充滿夢想與冒險的世界出發吧！
chattext3_en: Set off for a world full of dreams and adventures!

name: Sunshine
desc: A young trainer in the Alola area, after defeating the Four Heavenly Queen, he became the champion of the first generation of the Alola League and the master of the Alola illustrated book, and was invited to join the international police
desc_tw: 阿羅拉地區的少年訓練家，在打敗了四天王後成為了初代阿羅拉聯盟冠軍，也是阿羅拉圖鑒的大師，後受邀加入國際員警
unlockDesc_vn: Đặc thù hoạt động tung ra
chattext1: As long as I breathe the fresh air to my heart's content, I feel as if I have been reborn!
chattext2: I am very much looking forward to exploring unknown places with you!
chattext3: Did you know that Alora means "Good afternoon" or "Hello"!

name: Mizuki
desc: A talented girl trainer, once won the Alola League champion, the master of the Alola illustrated book, and was invited to join the international police
desc_tw: 天才少女訓練家，曾拿過阿羅拉聯盟冠軍，阿羅拉圖鑒的大師，後受邀加入國際員警
unlockDesc_vn: Đặc thù hoạt động tung ra
chattext1: Melomele Island, here I come!
chattext1_tw: 美樂美樂島，我來了!
chattext2: Thank you for preparing the banquet for me, I will continue to work hard
chattext2_tw: 謝謝大家為我準備的宴會，我會繼續加油的
chattext3: I'm sure I'll meet Tapu Naming again
chattext3_tw: 我相信一定會再次遇到卡璞・鳴鳴的

name: James
desc: Member of Team Rocket, James have a gentle personality, born in upper class family, after he left his family he met his companions Jessie & Meowth. They always followed Ash and tried to steal Ash's Pikachu, but never succeed.
desc_tw: 火箭隊成員，性格溫和，出生於上流社會，後叛逆離家出走，認識了現在的同伴武藏、喵喵兩人；三人總是跟著小智一行，企圖搶走小智的皮卡丘，但從沒成功過。
desc_en: Member of Team Rocket, James have a gentle personality, born in upper class family, after he left his family he met his companions Jessie & Meowth. They always followed Ash and tried to steal Ash's Pikachu, but never succeed.
desc_kr: 로켓단 삼인방의 일원이며 상당한 부잣집의 도련님이다. 집에서 도망쳐 헤메고 헤메다가 로켓단에 들어가게 된다.  지우의 피카츄를 손에 넣으려고 하지만 성공한 적이 없다.
unlockDesc_vn: Đặc thù hoạt động tung ra
chattext1: Since you have asked the question sincerely, we will tell you mercifully!
chattext1_tw: 既然你誠心誠意的發問了，我們就大發慈悲的告訴你！
chattext1_en: Prepare for trouble! Make it double!
chattext1_kr: 성심성의껏 물으 신다면, 대답해 드리는게 인지상정!
chattext2: In order to prevent the world from being destroyed, in order to protect the peace of the world; implement love and true evil, cute and charming villains.
chattext2_tw: 為了防止世界被破壞，為了守護世界的和平；貫徹愛與真實的邪惡，可愛又迷人的反派角色。
chattext2_en: To protect the world from devastation!To unite all peoples within our nation!To denounce the evils of truth and love!To extend our reach to the stars above!
chattext2_kr: 이세계의 파괴를 막기위해, 이세계의 평화를 지키기 위해; 사랑과 진실 어둠을 뿌리고 다니는, 포켓몬의 감초 귀염둥이 악당.
chattext3: Musashi! Kojiro! We are Team Rocket across the galaxy! White hole, white tomorrow is waiting for us! (That's it, meow!)
chattext3_tw: 武藏！小次郎！ 我們是穿梭在銀河的火箭隊！白洞，白色的明天在等著我們！ (就是這樣, 喵!)
chattext3_en: Jessie! James! Team Rocket blasts off at the speed of light! Surrender now or prepare to fight! (Meowth! That's right!)
chattext3_kr: 로사! 로이! 우주를 뛰어다니는 우리 로켓단들에겐 아름다운 미래, 밝은 일이 기다리고 있다! (난 나옹이다, 옹!)

name: Jessie
desc: Member of Team Rocket,Jessie is the short-tempered member of the Team Rocket trio,met her companions James & Meowth at Team Rocket Academy.They always followed Ash and tried to steal Ash's Pikachu, but never succeed.
desc_tw: 火箭隊成員，性格直率、潑辣，後在火箭隊學院認識了現在的同伴小次郎、喵喵兩人；三人總是跟著小智一行，企圖搶走小智的皮卡丘，但從沒成功過。
desc_en: Member of Team Rocket,Jessie is the short-tempered member of the Team Rocket trio,met her companions James & Meowth at Team Rocket Academy.They always followed Ash and tried to steal Ash's Pikachu, but never succeed.
desc_kr: 로켓단 삼인방의 일원이며 성질 급하고 막가파인 여장부로 상대적으로 순한 로이와 나옹을 완전히 휘어잡고 산다. 지우의 피카츄를 빼앗으려고 늘 따라다녔지만  성공한 적이 없다.

name: Ash (Christmas Limited)
desc: A true new town trainer in Christmas costumes, a ten-year-old boy who dreams of becoming a Pokémon master
desc_tw: 一身聖誕時裝的真新鎮訓練家, 夢想成為寶可夢大師的十歲少年
unlockDesc_vn: Đặc thù hoạt động tung ra
chattext1: Merry Christmas~~Merry!
chattext1_tw: 聖誕~~快樂！
chattext2: Oops, I forgot the Christmas cake!
chattext2_tw: 糟糕，聖誕蛋糕忘買了！
chattext3: Pikachu, let's go find Santa and deliver presents with the messenger bird!
chattext3_tw: 皮卡丘，我們去找聖誕老人和信使鳥一起送禮物吧！

name: Xiaoxia (Christmas Limited)
desc: The owner of the Hualan gymnasium in Christmas costumes, has a lively personality and yearns for a powerful trainer
desc_tw: 一身聖誕時裝的華藍道館館主, 性格活潑, 非常嚮往強大的訓練家
unlockDesc_vn: Đặc thù hoạt động tung ra
chattext1: Can you go to the Cape Cottage with me at Christmas, please!
chattext1_tw: 你能在耶誕節陪我一起去趟海角小屋嗎，拜託了！
chattext2: Looking forward to a snowy Christmas, Bobbi will love it!
chattext2_tw: 好期待下雪的耶誕節，波克比一定會很喜歡的！
chattext3: Take advantage of the festival and go on a trip!
chattext3_tw: 趁著節日，出門旅行吧！

name: Lana (Summer limited)
desc: Lana in summer clothes, likes to ride Lapras to fish in the sea
desc_tw: 夏日著裝的水蓮，喜歡騎著拉普拉斯在海中釣魚
desc_en: Lana in summertime wearing, likes to ride Lapras and sea fishing
desc_kr: 여름 옷차림의 수련은 라프라스를 타고 바다에서 낚시하는것을 좋아한다.
unlockDesc_vn: Đặc thù hoạt động tung ra
chattext1: Let's go to the beach together~
chattext1_tw: 一起去海灘玩耍吧~
chattext1_en: Let‘s go to the beach and have some fun!!
chattext1_kr: 같이 바다에 놀러가자~
chattext2: I can totally understand your desire to fish!
chattext2_tw: 你想要釣魚的心情，我完全可以理解！
chattext2_en: You want to fish, I can understand!
chattext2_kr: 당신이 낚시를 원하는 마음은 난 충분히 이해간다!
chattext3: It’s a call from the sea~ (laughs)
chattext3_tw: 是來自大海的呼喚~（笑）
chattext3_en: It's the call of the ocean! XD
